A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
JJ Abrams' Force Awakens might of been predictable\, very PC and playing it safe. But It setup for lot of good story that had me genuinely curious on a lot of yet to be developed plot points\, I was optimistic for TLJ.

But my god. Rian Johnson destroyed almost every single developing story JJ left to be expanded\, all for nothing. This movie is a complete mess\, so many occasions it missed the mark from obliterating the very cherished lore of the franchise to it being filled with pointless B-plot characters that all achieve nothing with what remains is a painful experience with as many plot holes as swiss cheese. 

I genuinely think this is the worst Star Wars film I've seen. I don't see how the SW franchise can redeem itself at this point.
